pr_title: Fixed race condition when merging tlog into config

timeline.message: Fixed race condition when merging tlog into config

timeline.bodyText:
nit
call the newer constructor from this one, with timestamp 0
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: can the older implementation call this one? I don't want to have duplicated logic.
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Yes for lookupTopics, but then there would be one more place where we set the default value of modtime as current system.
replies.author: fahadmohammed01

replies.bodyText: I'm happier with that than duplication of the actual logic. Duplicating the default time seems like a smaller issue
replies.author: MikeDombo
